name: Tug Of Pug
description:
Not much to say about this game. Break down block houses and avoid the angry mobs. Score points to unlock a proper ending.

More info

This is a MiniJam submission based on Kaiju and death not being the end.... er well, I tried to squeeze in the last bit. It's my first EVER Jam submission and public game upload. So it was very interesting to spend 3 short days on.
